item.description:
I changed the time to 4PM - Yes I gave into your pressure! and well- the idea that you'll have better light - didn't hurt you either...Please spread the word!!! Let everyone know 4 PM!

Thanks
Donna



So--- I am thinking May 4th for our official photo walk, say 1 pm in the afternoon...I think we should meet in Hope Cemetery, right at the entrance, it would be good place to start and end. Then walk to the area of Webster Street that has some factory buildings and walk back to the cemeteries.

Thoughts?

Donna

Here is the official web site for the place to meet:

http://www.friendsofh...
item.how_to_find_us: We have a silver honda and will be parked near the front entrance of the place... look for the folks with camera gear.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Photo Walk in Worcester
